group_1.narration: The cases of fainting Magical Girls...@The rumor blaming us for them...
I said I got my info from my talks with@Nanaka Tokiwa (it wasn't a total lie)...
Anyway, I told Konoha all of it.

group_1.textLeft: The world's the same, wherever you go...

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: I have no plans to protest our innocence@from the rooftops.
We shouldn't let these ridiculous rumors@bother us.
For now, let's just keep our eyes peeled.

group_1.textRight: Okay...

group_1.textLeft: I don't care for how things are going.@What with those visions I saw...

group_1.textRight: Mm, yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, you don't think? The two things couldn't@possibly...

group_1.textRight: Are you trying to say they could @be...connected?
I mean, I know what you mean, but there's no@evidence to support that hypothesis...

group_1.textLeft: You're right. They could be completely@unrelated.
After all, there's no way to even tell if the@visions are caused by magic or not...
But for some reason, I can't shake the@feeling...

group_1.textRight: You just sense they're connected?

group_1.textLeft: But something gives me the chills.

group_1.narration: Konoha was right. We couldn't go and@tell people ourselves "We're not guilty!"
But it was a real problem for us, @and it was already having consequences...

group_1.textRight: I am Yachiyo Nanami.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, she's...[chara:302700:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] Remember, I told you about@her before.
The most experienced Magical Girl in@Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: I suppose so... I've been doing this for a@long time.
But I'm not sure how I feel about people @saying I have the most experience.
It makes me sound kind of old...

group_1.textLeft: Huuuh... So how old are ya?

group_1.textRight: How old do I look?

group_1.textLeft: What? Hmm, lemme see, lemme see...
Ayame, play your guessing game later.
Though I do think you're older than I am.

group_1.textRight: Oh? On what basis do you make that judgment?
Right, of course...
I'd like to discuss the recent situation of@Magical Girls fainting from unknown causes.

group_1.textLeft: It wasn't us, it wasn't uuus!
Uh, Ayame, you make us sound guilty saying@it like that.

group_1.textRight: Allow me to explain myself first.
Many things happen here in Kamihama...
For instance, sometimes a Magical Girl@will challenge another to a battle...
There even used to be a girl like that who@went by the nickname "the Duelist".
Her name is Tsuruno Yui. She'd lunge at just@about anyone...
But she'd challenge her opponents to their@faces. Very different from this.
Also, Familiars have faked being Magical@Girls to trick allies into fighting before.
So you see, it isn't unheard of here for@Magical Girls to get attacked like this.
And yet...
This's the first instance I've heard of girls@passing out without taking a single hit.
And the other day...
It happened to one of my friends.
Her name is Momoko Togame.
She was caught off guard by a Familiar's@attack in the past...
Since that happened, she never lets her@guard down.
And yet, even she fainted...

group_1.textLeft: S-so then...she's still sleepin'? Even now?

group_1.textRight: Thankfully she's fine. She only lost@consciousness for a few minutes.
But one of Momoko's friends got very upset@about it...
She believes the rumor is true... That your@group was the one that did it.

group_1.textLeft: I'm just going to come right out and say@it... We did not do it.

group_1.textRight: I suppose not.
I was there when Momoko was "attacked".

group_1.textLeft: So did you see them? The attacker...

group_1.textRight: I did not.
Still, I was certain it wasn't you three the@moment I met you.

group_1.textLeft: Even though you literally just met us...?

group_1.textRight: The magic I felt when she was attacked was@completely different from yours.
That's all I needed to know. Sorry for@disturbing you.

group_1.textLeft: It's all right. We're just glad you don't@suspect us anymore...

group_1.textRight: I hope you didn't take this the wrong way.
Thank you...
All right then. Have a good evening.

group_1.textLeft: I guess that clears us as suspects.@...Right?

group_1.textRight: Right, right, right! Of course it does!
We didn't do anything! It's totally messed up@to blame us in the first place!
Right, Konoha?!

group_1.textLeft: It's everyone around us with the problem...

group_1.narration: What Konoha was planning to do.
